title: Coordination Request Context Schema
description: Input context schema for generating coordination request artifacts via chora-compose. This schema defines the structure of user-provided context that will be transformed into SAP-001 compliant coordination request JSON.

request_type.description: Type of coordination request, influences which content blocks are emphasized

title.description: Human-readable title for the request (50-80 chars recommended)
examples: Exploring chora-compose Integration for Inbox Automation

purpose.description: High-level purpose of this request (1-3 sentences). Used to generate context.background and inform other fields.

deliverables.description: Concrete outputs expected from this request

acceptance_criteria.description: Measurable conditions for completion. If not provided, will be generated from deliverables.

trace_id.description: Optional trace ID for multi-phase projects (format: kebab-case-name-year)

timeline.description: Optional timeline, milestones, or deadline information

related.description: Related work that provides context but doesn't block

background.description: Detailed background explaining current situation, problem, and why this request (2-4 paragraphs). If not provided, will be generated from purpose.

rationale.description: Why this approach was chosen over alternatives. Recommended for exploratory and prescriptive requests.

oneOf.description: Simple array of questions (for exploratory requests)

questions.description: Specific questions to be answered (most common in exploratory requests)

collaboration_modes.description: Different engagement levels offered to recipient (exploratory external requests)

boundaries.description: What we are NOT requesting (clarifies scope, reduces anxiety). Also known as 'not_requesting' or 'scope_exclusions'.

additional_context.description: Freeform additional context that doesn't fit above fields. Will be incorporated into appropriate sections.

questions.description: Questions are highly recommended for exploratory requests

collaboration_modes.description: Collaboration modes recommended for exploratory external requests

deliverables.description: Prescriptive requests typically have 5-15 specific deliverables

acceptance_criteria.description: Prescriptive requests typically have 8-15 measurable criteria

questions.description: Questions recommended for peer reviews (what to assess)

collaboration_modes.description: Review depth options recommended for peer reviews

examples.title: Exploring chora-compose Integration for Inbox Automation
examples.purpose: We want to explore whether chora-compose can automate our SAP-001 inbox artifact generation, reducing manual JSON creation time from 30-60 minutes to 5-10 minutes per request.
deliverables: Integration options comparison with effort estimates
Recommendation on whether to proceed with pilot
